description: From a series of nine etchings, Das Gesicht (The Face), published by Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924; head and shoulders of a boy looking directly at the viewer; a wisp of hair stands upright at the top of his head and his inner ears have dark, cross-hatched lines; dark diagonal lines set closely together cover parts of his forehead, cheeks, and across a portion of his neck
inscription: LL of sheet, in pencil: Mappe \"das gesicht\" (9 Blattes) | LR of sheet, in pencil: Probedruck | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Dr. Rauert E 162
portfolio: From Plate 8 from Das Gesicht (The Face), Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté
title: Boy's Head (Self-Portrait), Plate 8 from Das Gesicht (The Face)
